title: CS577 Finals
body: For past and current CS577 students, how do you prepare for the finals? What is the most effective way to prepare for a final paper to maximize your score? Thanks!
comments: Hey I'm one of the peer mentors for CS577 this semester. I will be uploading my refined cheatsheet from my last semester to Canvas tonight. I will send a piazza announcement about this, and I hope my cheatsheet can help you start your review. :)

For CS577?  Learn the material as you go, understand how to apply it and how to prove that your application is correct.  It isn't a class you can effectively cram for or produce a magical cheat sheet for.
